originalText.text: I have a strong positive bias for Sara's work.  I began working with Sara in 1980, as a client, a student and to help build her clientele.  I have seen the NeuroMuscular Center grow from a yoga mat to a fully staged healing arena.  Whenever I have a colleague, student, friend, family member with some physical disorder, I immediately refer them to The NeuroMuscular Center.  For myself, I have had various muscle and back strains that Sara has expeditiously healed.  I have referred a female with fasciitis in her foot which was crippling her; a cousin with a kidney disorder who felt his days were numbered -- he is still around, nasty as ever!  A female with chronic back pain who has been able to return to work.  Sara worked with her physically as well as mentally, providing the confidence the female needed to return to work.  In learning about Sara's business, I took her Development Course and have incorporated that course into my Psychology Courses in College ever since.  It is absolutely the best course I have taken (and ultimately have taught) for over 20 years.  I don't even listen to people's complaints anymore!  I just say, "Go call Sara!"

originalText.text:
Sara is back!

Now, not only does Sara relieve us of our usual aches, pain and strains; she also frees up our backs, shoulders and necks that have jammed up from the added stress and worry of the pandemic.

I was among Sara's first clients to have a session with her in June. She is taking every precaution to minimize any risk of her clients getting or passing on Covid-19.

If you want some relief from life's traumas and the pandemic's stresses, schedule a session with Sara.

You'll be glad you did!

originalText.text: One of the most knowledgeable practitioners I know.  Sara was able to diagnos my thyroid issue that I had been struggling with for years.  Kind thoughtful and truly gifted in her ability to perceive and treat multiple medical issues.   A rare find and worth every penny

originalText.text: Sara is a consummate profession who practices her craft with meticulous insight and ability.  Her professional caring manner eases your concerns and helps resolve whatever physical issues you might have. I recommend using her for whatever physical issues you feel are holding you back.

originalText.text: I went in with a torn shoulder and much pain.  The work with Sara resulted in a looser, more relaxed shoulder/arm and a different wave of pain.  One session is obviously not sufficient.  I have made another appointment for more work.  Sara is amazing.
